main event: A civilian sighted a flying object in San Angelo, Texas on 25/09/1964.
interesting points: The object hovered in a green light cone about the size of a TV screen., The sighting lasted approximately 30-45 seconds., The object initially moved northwest before changing direction towards Goodfellow AFB., There was no available angle of elevation for the sighting., The local FAA tower reported no flight activity in the area during the sighting.
witness description: Civilian observer, elderly female, specifics unknown.
